definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

sentences.english: When Picasso is 18 years old, created oneself depict of the first copperplate .
sentences.chinese: 畢加索18歲時，創作了自己第一幅銅版刻畫。

sentences.english: He found an original drawing of Picasso's in the basement of his father's house.
sentences.chinese: 他在父親房屋的地下室裏找到了一幅畢加索的真跡。

sentences.english: I like Picasso's drawings of bullfighters.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡畢加索描繪鬥牛士的畫作。

sentences.english: From now on, this girl made Picasso brushwork and carven model.
sentences.chinese: 從此，這位少女便成爲了畢加索繪畫和雕刻的模特。

sentences.english: The painter modeled his style after that of Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 這位畫家模仿畢加索的繪畫風格。

sentences.english: You can't get an original Picasso for love nor money.
sentences.chinese: 你無論怎麼樣也不會得到一幅畢加索的真跡。

sentences.english: Thumbtacks anchor a colorful Picasso print to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 一副畢加索的畫用圖釘釘在牆上。

sentences.english: In that case, the conscience conscience to friend Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的話，良心上有愧於朋友畢加索。

sentences.english: I'm going to gather some materials about Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 我籌算彙集一些涉及畢加索的質料。

sentences.english: Picasso and the poet Max Jacob, down but not out in Paris, shared abed in turn.
sentences.chinese: 畢加索和詩人雅科布在巴黎近郊輪流睡一張牀。
畢加索的壁畫《格爾尼卡》堪稱鉅作。

sentences.english: He quoted the example of Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 他引用了畢加索的例子。

sentences.english: Picasso's old age had been living in the pedicle cloth until his death.
sentences.chinese: 畢加索晚年就一直居住在昂蒂布直至去世。

sentences.english: General Newton: I dont know the difference between Picasso and a car crash.
sentences.chinese: 我看不出畢加索的畫和一場交通變亂有什麼不同。

sentences.english: And the Picasso -Exhibition in the city museum is also worth visiting.
sentences.chinese: 還有市博物館裏正舉辦畢加索的展覽，也很值得一看。

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
portrait/to do a portrait of sb
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
